title: Cell
description: This schema describes the JSON file structure for the cell configuration, which provides general configuration for the ambassador, such as paths to the regions and network configuration files.

bandwidthMeasurementInterval.description: Interval in which the bandwidth is aggregated, given in seconds.

bandwidthMeasurementCompression.description: If enabled, the export files with bandwidth measurements will be compressed using gzip compression.

networkConfigurationFile.description: Relative path to the network configuration file.

regionConfigurationFile.description: Relative path to the region configuration file.

bandwidthMeasurement.title: bandwidthMeasurement
bandwidthMeasurement.description: Object to define the bandwidth measurement between regions.

fromRegion.description: Measure the bandwidth of messages which originate in this region (use wildcard * for all regions).

toRegion.description: Measure the bandwidth of messages which target in this region (use wildcard * for all regions).

transmissionMode.description: Defines the transmission mode which is observed.
